title: Enable tools/services for accelerated workflows
notes:
Research and enable tools to speed up Apollo & Daydream Tees workflows:

**High Priority**
- Printify Premium ($29.99/mo) — Required for API automation

**Medium Priority**
- Midjourney ($10/mo) — Best AI images for merch designs
- Canva Pro ($13/mo) — Better templates, no watermarks
- Remove.bg Pro — Unlimited background removal

**Useful to Have**
- ChatGPT Plus ($20/mo) — DALL-E 3 access
- Etsy Seller account/API — Automated listing posting
- Vercel — Deploy Second Brain app
- GitHub — Version control for projects

**Hardware Projects**
- Arduino IDE / PlatformIO — ESP32 coding
- AWS/Cloud services — For APIs and hosting

**Decision needed**: Which services to enable first?
story: As the owner of this task, I want to enable tools and services that accelerate our workflows so that we can move execution forward quickly. Key details: Review list and enable high-priority services (Printify Premium first), then decide on medium priority tools.

notes: Desktop dashboard showing mood, thoughts, and tasks. Will be the core system; Pocket Clawd becomes a thin client. Output: second-brain/apps/clawd-status/ with Avatar, MoodCard, and TaskBoard components.

title: Design Pocket Clawd enclosure in Fusion 360
notes: For DIYmalls ESP32-C3 1.28" display module. Output: 3D print-ready STL/3MF file. Concept doc: pm/outputs/hardware/2026-02-01_2130_pocket-clawd-esp32-concept.md
story: As the owner of this task, I want to model a 3D enclosure for Pocket Clawd so that we can 3D print a pocket-friendly case. Key details: Design should accommodate ESP32-C3 display module, 1200mAh battery, allow access to USB-C port, and be comfortable in hand.
